# isContentAwareDistortionCorrectionEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the system applies content-aware distortion correction when capturing the photo.

## Declaration

```swift
var isContentAwareDistortionCorrectionEnabled: Bool { get }
```

## Examining photo capture settings

- **isFlashEnabled**: A Boolean value indicating whether the camera flash fires for this capture.
- **isRedEyeReductionEnabled**: A Boolean value indicating whether the camera automatically reduces red-eye when capturing photos.
- **isVirtualDeviceFusionEnabled**: A Boolean value that specifies whether the system automatically uses virtual device image fusion.
- **isFastCapturePrioritizationEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system uses fast capture prioritization when capturing the photo.
- **isStillImageStabilizationEnabled**: A Boolean value indicating whether this capture uses image stabilization.
- **isDualCameraFusionEnabled**: A Boolean value indicating whether this capture combines image data from a dual camera.
